query.description: Search up to 15k most recent logs ( 7 days )
query.name: CHAaSM search
query.query:
SELECT *
FROM default.default_log_store
WHERE (appname='falco'
      OR appname='journal'
      OR appname='chaasm-clas')
 AND ((MONTH=date_format(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,'%M')
       AND DAY=date_format(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,'%e')
       AND YEAR=date_format(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,'%Y'))
      OR (MONTH=date_format((CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - interval '24' hour),'%M')
          AND DAY=date_format((CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - interval '24' hour),'%e')
          AND YEAR=date_format((CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - interval '24' hour),'%Y'))
      OR (MONTH=date_format((CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - interval '48' hour),'%M')
          AND DAY=date_format((CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - interval '48' hour),'%e')
          AND YEAR=date_format((CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - interval '48' hour),'%Y'))
      OR (MONTH=date_format((CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - interval '72' hour),'%M')
          AND DAY=date_format((CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - interval '72' hour),'%e')
          AND YEAR=date_format((CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - interval '72' hour),'%Y'))
      OR (MONTH=date_format((CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - interval '96' hour),'%M')
          AND DAY=date_format((CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - interval '96' hour),'%e')
          AND YEAR=date_format((CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - interval '96' hour),'%Y'))
      OR (MONTH=date_format((CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - interval '120' hour),'%M')
          AND DAY=date_format((CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - interval '120' hour),'%e')
          AND YEAR=date_format((CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - interval '120' hour),'%Y'))
      OR (MONTH=date_format((CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - interval '144' hour),'%M')
          AND DAY=date_format((CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - interval '144' hour),'%e')
          AND YEAR=date_format((CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - interval '144' hour),'%Y')))
ORDER BY TIMESTAMP DESC
LIMIT 15000
